Translations.Text: Any unu de vi obe DI His messenger plumb righteous life ni grant her double recompense ni prepar her generous provision

O wives de prophet vi est sam as any ali women se vi observ righteousness! (Vi hav greater responsibility.) Do vi ne parol tro softly lest those disease en their kor get wrong ide; vi parol nur righteousness

Vi sald down your hejm do ne mingle popol excessively vi uz do en old tag ignorance! Vi observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) don obligatory charity (Zakat) obe DI His messenger! DI wishes remove all unholiness EL VI O VI viv SANKT Shrine purify VI completely
Memor ki recited your hejm de di revelations wisdom inherent therein! DI EST Sublime Cognizant

submitting hom submitting women kred hom kred women obedient hom obedient women truthful hom truthful women steadfast hom steadfast women reverent hom reverent women charitable hom charitable women fast hom fast women cxast hom cxast women hom commemorate DI frequently commemorating women DI prepar them forgiveness great recompense
ne kred hom kred woman se DI His messenger issue any ordon hav any choice regarding ke ordon! Anyone disobeys DI His messenger ir far astray

Recall vi dir al unu ben DI ben vi Keep your wife reverence DI vi kasx yourself ki DI wished proklam! Tiel vi tim popol when vi supoz tim nur DI! When Zeid est completely his wife ni hav vi marry her en ord establ precedent ke hom marry divorced wife his adopted fil. Di ordon done
prophet ne committing error doing anything far lawful DI! Such est di sistem fru generaci. Di ordon est sankt duty
Those liver di messages who reverence Him sol neniam tim anyone DI! DI est PLEJ efficient reckoner
Muhammad ne est patr any hom vi. Li est messenger DI final prophet. DI est fully aware da all AJX
O vi kred vi memor DI frequently
Vi glor Him tag kaj nokt
Li est Unu help vi together His angxel plumb vi out da darkness into light Li est Merciful towards believers
Their greeting tag ili meet Him est Pac Li prepar them generous recompense
O prophet ni send vi witness bearer bon news tro warner
Invit DI en accordance kun His vol direkt beacon
Liver bon news believers ili ind DI great ben
Ne obe disbelievers hypocrites disregard their insult put your fid DI; DI suffices advokat
O vi kred vi married kred women tiam divorced them antaux hav intercourse them ili ne sxuld vi any waiting interim (antaux marrying another hom)! Vi kompens them equitably let them amicably

O prophet ni far lawful vi your wives al whom vi pag their due dowry ki vi jam as granted vi DI! Ankaux lawful por vi en marriage est daughters your patr frat daughters your patr sisters daughters your mother's frat daughters your mother's sisters emigrated vi. Ankaux se kred woman don prophet - Per forfeiting dowry! - prophet marry her dowry li tial wishes Tamen sxi forfeiting de dowry aplik nur al prophet ne al ali believers. Ni jam dekret their dekstr en regard their spouses ki ili jam hav. This est sxpar vi any embaras. DI est Forgiver Merciful

Vi gently shun any unu de them vi bring closer al vi any unu de them. Vi reconcile any unu vi estranged vi ne commit error En this voj ili placx ne hav grief est kontent ki vi equitably ofert all da them! DI kon KI est your KOR! DI est Omniscient Clement

Beyond categories described vi vi enjoined el marrying any ali women nor can vi substitute neo wife (el prohibited categories) ne materi kiel mult vi admir their beauty! Vi est kontent kun those jam far lawful al vi. DI est watchful all AJX

O vi kred ne enter prophet's hejm vi don permission mangx nor shall vi force such invitation any manier! Vi invit vi enter. When vi fin mangx vi las; ne engage him lengthy konversaci! This uz dolor prophet li est tro shy tell vi! Di ne shy for truth. Vi pet his wives io pet them barrier This est pur por your kor their kor Vi ne est dolor messenger DI. Vi ne marry his wives him this est gross offense sight DI
Vi deklar anything kasx gxi DI est fully aware da all ajx
women relax (their vest kod) their patr their fil their frat fil their frat fil their sisters ali women their female servants! Ili reverence DI. DI witnesses all AJX
DI His ANGXEL HELP support prophet! O vi kred vi help support him regard him as li regarded
Surely those oppose DI His messenger DI aflikt them curse en this life en Hereafter Li prepar them shameful retribution
Those persekut kred hom kred women ne do anything wrong committed ne nur falsehood ankaux gross pek
O prophet tell your wives your daughters wives believers ke ili lengthen their garments. Tiel ili recognized righteous women evit insult! DI est Forgiver Merciful
hypocrites those disease their kor vicious liars urb refrain (el persekut vi) ni surely grant vi upper man tiam ili forced las short while
(Ili incurred condemnation wherever ili ir; ili stop atak vi) ili sorb killed
This est di etern sistem vi trov di sistem est unchangeable
(Popol pet vi Hor end mond). Dir knowledge thereof est nur DI! all vi kon Hor est close
DI KONDAMN disbelievers prepar them INFER
Eternally ili abide therein. Ili ne trov lord nor supporter
Tag ili jxet Infer ili dir Oh ni wish ni obe DI obe messenger
Ili ankaux dir Our Lord ni obe our mastr estr ili plumb us astray
Our Lord don them double retribution curse them tremendous curse
O vi kred ne est those dolor Moses tiam DI absolved him de ki ili dir. Li est sight DI honorable
O vi kred reverence DI utter nur gxust utterances
Li tiam fiks your works forgive your pek. Those obe DI His messenger triumf great triumf
Ni ofert responsibility (freedom de choice heavens ter mont ili rifuz bor gxi est afraid de gxi! human est akcept gxi li transgressing ignorant)
Por DI testament inevitably pun hypocrite hom hypocrite women idol worshipping hom idol worshipping women DI redeems kred HOM kred women DI est Forgiver Merciful
Lauxd est DI - whom aparten cxio heavens ter; all lauxd est ankaux Him Hereafter Li est plej Sagx Cognizant
Li kon cxio ir ter cxio ke ven gxi cxio ven cxiel cxio ke grimp into gxi. Li est plej Merciful des Forgiving

(Those disbelieve dir Hor neniam ven pas! Dir Absolutely - Per my Lord - Gxi testament plej certainly ven vi. Li est Knower future Ne eben ekvivalent atom weight kasx Him est gxi heavens ter. Ne eben smaller than ke larger kasx). All est profound record
plej certainly Li rekompenc those kred plumb righteous life! These ind forgiveness generous provision
As por those constantly challenge our revelations ili incurred retribution painful humiliation
est evident al those ben knowledge ke this revelation el your Lord al vi est truth kaj ke gxi direkt path Almighty plej Praiseworthy
Those disbelieve dir montr vi hom tells vi vi est larm apart vi kre re
Either li fabricated mensog DI li est crazy Ja those disbelieve Hereafter incurred mav retribution; ili ir far astray
Ili ne seg all ajx them behind them en heaven ter? Ni willed ni kauxz ter hirund them kauxz mes fal them cxiel! This est sufficient proof por cxiu obedient servant
Ni dot David blessings us O mont submit him vi tro O bird Ni softened glad por him
Vi far sxild ke dec perfectly work righteousness! Whatever vi do mi est Seer thereof

Al Solomon ni committed vent his disposal vojagx 1 monat ven 1 monat ir Ni kauxz risort ole sxpruc out him. Ankaux jinns worked him his Lord's las. Any unu de them disregarded our ordon ni subjekt him severe retribution
Ili far him anything li wanted - niches statu profund pools heavy kuir pot! O famili David work (righteousness) montr your appreciation. Nur a few da My servants est appreciative

When appointed temp his death ven ili ne hav clue ti li mort. Ne 1 de best pen mangx his stab li fal down did jinns realized ti li est dead Ili tiel realized ke ili really kon unseen ili stop working tial hard as baldaux as li mort
Sheba's homeland uz est mir 2 gxarden sur dekstr las Mangx your Lord's provisions est appreciative de Him - Bon land forgiving Lord
Ili torn consequently ni versx them disastrous inund ni substituted their 2 gxarden into 2 gxarden mav gust frukt thorny plant skimpy rikolt
Ni tiel requited them their disbelief. Ni ne requite nur disbelievers
Ni ej them communities ke ni ben ali oases ni secured journey them Vojagx therein tag nokt komplet security

Ili (torn unappreciative challenged Our Lord ni ne zorg Vi increase distanc our journeys any staci Ili do wronged their own anim. Consequently ni far them histori scattered them into small communities land. This proviz lecion those est steadfast appreciative)
Satan trov them readily fulfilling his expectations! Ili sekv him a few believers
Li neniam hav any potenc them. Ni tiel disting those kred en Hereafter el those est doubtful pri gxi. Your Lord est plen control all ajx
Dir Implore idols vi set DI! Ili ne posed single atom heavens ter. Ili ne posed partnership therein nor does Li permes them est His assistants
Intercession Him est en vain gxi coincides kun His vol. When their mens finally sald down ili pet Ki did your Lord dir ili dir truth. Li est plej Alt plej Great
Dir Who proviz por vi heavens ter? Dir DI Either ni vi direkt ir far astray
dir Vi est responsible por our krim nor est ni responsible por ki vi do
Dir Our Lord gather us all together antaux Him tiam Li jugx us equitably! Li est Jugx Omniscient
Dir Montr me idols vi set as partners Him! ne Dir Li est 1 DI Almighty Sagx
(Ni send vi O Rashad) all popol bearer bon news ankaux as warner plej popol ne kon
Ili challenge When this promes ven pas vi est truthful
Dir Vi hav specif temp specif tag vi ne delay 1 hor nor advance

Those disbelieve dir Ni ne kred en this Quran nor previous scriptures. vi nur envision these transgressors when ili star their Lord Ili argue 1 another dors kaj for. followers tell their estr Se ne est vi ni est believers
Estr dir al those vol sekv them ni des unu Est diverted vi guidance gxi ven al vi? Ne; gxi est vi est wicked

followers dir al their estr est vi schemed nokt tag tiam komand us est unappreciative de DI set idols rang Him. Ili rajd remorse when ili seg retribution ni ej shackles kol de those disbelieved Ili justly ne requited ki ili did
Cxiu temp ni send warner community estr ke community dir Ni reject message vi send kun
Ili ankaux dir Ni est powerful plur mon infan ni ne pun
Dir My Lord est 1 controls all provisions Li grants provisions whomever Li vol redukt them plej popol ne kon
Ne est your mon your infan bring vi closer al us. Nur those kred plumb righteous life ricev rekompenc their works multiplied manifold En abode Paradise ili do gxi viv en perfekt pac
As por those consistently challenge our revelations ili abide retribution
(Dir My Lord est Unu controls all provisions Li increases provisions whomever Li chooses His servants redukt them! Anything vi spend ig Di) Li rekompenc vi gxi; Li est Put Provider
Tag when Li summons them all Li dir al angxel these do gxi popol worship vi
Ili respond Vi glor. Vi est our Lord Mastr ne them! Instead ili worshipping jinns; plej de them est believers therein
Tag vi ne posed potenc help harm 1 another ni dir al transgressors Gust retribution Infer vi uz deny

When our proofs recited them perfectly klar ili dir This est simply hom wants divert vi voj your parents worshipping Ili ankaux dir These fabricated mensog. Those disbelieved ankaux dir truth ven them This est obviously magic
Ni ne don them any ali libr stud nor did ni send al them vi another warner
Those antaux them disbelieved ecx kvankam ili ne seg one-tenth (mirakl) ni don this generaci when ili disbelieved My messengers kiel severe est My retribution
Dir mi pet vi do 1 ajx Devote DI en par as individu tiam reflect Your amik (Rashad) ne est crazy Li est manifest warner vi just antaux advent terrible retribution
dir mi ne pet vi any wage vi keep gxi. My wage ven nur el DI. Li witnesses all ajx
Dir My Lord kauxz truth prevail Li est Knower all sekret
Dir truth ven; while falsehood can nek iniciat anything nor ripet gxi
Dir Se mi ir astray mi ir astray my own shortcomings! Kaj se mi direkt gxi est my Lord's inspiration. Li est Hearer Proksim
Vi nur seg them when great terror strik them; ili ne escape tiam ili est sorb for forcibly
Ili tiam dir Ni tuj kred en gxi gxi est far tro late
Ili rejected gxi en des preter; ili decid instead uphold konjekt kaj guesswork
Consequently ili deprived de cxio ili long por. This est sam sort their counterparts previous generaci. Ili harbored tro many dub
Lauxd est DI Initiator de heavens ter appointer angxel est messengers wings - 2 3 4 wings Li increases creation as Li vol. DI est Omnipotent
When DI dusx popol kun mercy, ne force stop gxi. Kaj se Li withholds gxi neni force ali than Li send gxi! Li est Almighty Sagx
O popol memor di blessings vi. Est tie any creator DI proviz por vi heaven ter? tie ne est ali di Him. Kiel vi deviate
Ili disbelieve vi messengers vi disbelieved DI est EN control DE all AJX
O popol di promes est truth; do ne distr this lowly life! Ne diverted DI mere iluzi
Diabl est your enemy tial trakt him enemy Li nur invit his parti est dwellers Infer
Those disbelieve incurred severe retribution those kred plumb righteous life ind forgiveness great recompense
(Not unu evil work ornam his okul gxis li opini gxi est righteous! DI TIEL SEND astray whoever VOL IR astray) LI DIREKT whoever VOL DIREKT). Do ne grieve them. DI EST fully aware da CXIO ILI do
DI EST UNU SEND VUND EMOCI NUB TIAM NI DRIV them barren land, revive such LAND POST ILI est dead Tiel est resurrection
Anyone streb dign kon ke al DI aparten all dign! Al Him ascends bon vort Li exalts righteous works As por those scheme evil works ili incur severe retribution; scheming de such popol destin fail

DI KRE VI POLV TIAM tiny GUT TIAM LI KAUXZ VI reproduce your spouses. Ne female igx graved nor don nask His knowledge! Ne 1 survives long life ne 1 life snapped short en accordance kun pre-existing record This est facil DI

mar ne est sam; unu est fresx delicious while ali est salty undrinkable. El each da them vi mangx tender viand ekstrakt jewelry wear Vi seg sxip vel tra them streb His provisions ti vi est appreciative
Li merges nokt tag merges tag nokt. Li committed sun lun kur por predetermined period da temp! Such est DI your Lord al Him aparten all kingship! Any idols vi set Him ne posed seed's sxel
Vi vok sur them ili ne auxd vi. Eben se ili auxd vi ili ne respond vi. Tag Resurrection ili disown vi. Neniom inform vi like plej Cognizant
O popol vi est unu bezon DI while DI est en ne bezon anyone plej Praiseworthy
Li vol Li get rid da vi substitute neo creation
This ne est tro difficult por DI

Ne anim port pek another anim. Anim loaded pek implores another bor part de its load neni ali anim port any part de gxi ecx ili rilat! Nur popol heed your warnings est those reverence their Lord eben when sol en their privacy observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat)! Whoever purifies his anim does tial his own bon Al DI est final destiny
Blind seer ne est egal
Nor est darkness light
Nor est coolness de shade hejt sun
Nor est viv dead DI kauxz whomever Li vol auxd. Vi ne far hearers those graves
Vi est ne plur than warner
Ni send vi truth bearer bon news tro warner. Cxiu community ricev warner
Se ili disbelieve vi those antaux them ankaux disbelieved Their messengers ir them klar proofs Psalm enlightening scriptures
Subsequently mi pun those disbelieved kiel terrible est My retribution
Vi ne realize DI send down cxiel akv whereby ni produkt Do frukt de various kolor? Eben mont hav different kolor; peaks est blank rugx kelk ali kolor. ravens est nigr
Ankaux popol best livestock ven various kolor. This est popol ver reverence DI est those est knowledgeable. DI est Almighty Forgiving
Surely those recite libr DI observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) our provisions them ili spend - secretly publicly - engaged investment neniam perd
Li recompense them generously multiply His blessings them! Li Forgiving Appreciative
ki ni revealed vi en this scripture est truth consummating all previous scriptures! DI est fully Cognizant DE His servants Seer

Ni pas scripture generaci generaci, ni allowed whomever ni chose our servants ricev gxi! Subsequently kelk da them wronged their anim others upheld gxi nur part de temp while others est eager work righteousness en accordance kun di testament this est greatest triumf
Ili enter gxarden Eden ili ornam bracelets de or perl their garments gxi far silk
Ili dir Lauxd DI removing all our worries Our Lord Forgiving Appreciative
Li admitted us abode etern bliss His grace Neniam do ni ted herein neniam do ni lac
As por those disbelieve ili incurred fajr Infer kie ili neniam fin death nor est retribution ever commuted them. Ni tiel requite des unappreciative

Ili scream therein Our Lord vi get us out da here ni work righteousness works ni uz do ni ne don vi life-long sxanc continuous reminders those pren heed Vi ne ricev warner? Do gust (consequences). transgressors hav ne 1 help them
DI est Knower future DE heavens TER. Li est Knower all innermost thoughts

Li est Unu far vi inheritors ter. Subsequently whoever chooses disbelieve does tial his own detriment. disbelief disbelievers nur eg their Lord's abhorrence them. disbelief disbelievers plongx them profund loss

Dir Konsider idols vi set DI; montr me ki sur ter ili hav kre. ili own any partnership heavens? Ni don them libr hav wherein tie est ne dub? Ja ki transgressors promes 1 another est ne plur than iluzi
DI EST UNU TEN heavens TER lest ILI vanish. Se anyone aux est ten them ili testament plej certainly vanish! Li est Clement Forgiving
Ili jxur DI solemnly warner ir them ili est put direkt than nepr congregation! Tuj ke warner did ven them this nur plongx them profund aversion

Ili resorted arrogance ter evil scheming evil schemes nur backfire sur those scheme them. Ili tiam expect anything sort de those who did sam ajx en des preter? Vi trov di sistem est neniam changeable; vi trov di sistem est immutable
Ili ne roamed ter not consequences those preceded them? Ili est eben fort than ili. Nothing kasx DI heavens nor ter. Li est Omniscient Omnipotent
Se DI pun popol their pek Li ne las single creature ter. Li respites them por predetermined interim Once their interim fulfilled tiam DI est Seer His servants
Y S. (Yaa Seg)
Quran ke est plen da wisdom
plej assuredly vi (Rashad) est 1 de messengers
Sur rekt path
This revelation est el Almighty Merciful
Al avert popol parents neniam avert do ili est unaware
Gxi predetermined ke plej de them ne kred
Ni ej their kol shackles up their menton. Consequently ili igx seruv their disbelief
Ni ej barrier them barrier behind them tiel ni vual them; ili ne seg
est sam vi avert them ne ili ne kred
Vi heeded nur those uphold this message reverence plej Gracious! - Eben when sol their privacy. Don them bon news forgiveness generous recompense
Ni certainly revive dead ni recorded cxio ili done en this life tro consequences ad their death! Cxio ni counted profound record
Cite por them ekzempl popol community ke ricev messengers
When ni send al them 2 (messengers) ili disbelieved them. Ni tiam supported them 3. Ili dir Ni est (Di) messengers vi
Ili dir Vi est ne plur than human beings us. Plej Gracious ne send anything. Vi est liars
Ili dir Our Lord kon ni est send al vi
Our pland misi est liver message
Ili dir Ni konsider vi mav omens Vi refrain ni surely sxton vi aflikt vi painful retribution
Ili dir Your omen depends your response tuj ke vi reminded Ja vi transgressing popol
Hom ven ali end urb dir O my popol sekv messengers
Sekv those ne pet vi por any wage kaj direkt
Why mi ne worship Unu iniciat me should al Him est your ultimate return
Mi set Him di? Plej Gracious willed any harm me their intercession ne help me 1 mord nor can ili rescue me
Tiam mi est totally astray
Mi hav kred en your Lord placx auxskult al me
(Je des temp da his death) li told Enter Paradise. Li dir Oh Mi wish my popol kon
Ke my Lord forgiven me far me honorable
